pages.text: After some research, you've found a way to create a more powerful version of the Cursed Cage. The Arca not only holds your Totem like a regular Cursed Cage, it will absorb and distribute Soul Energy as if the Totem was on you.
The Arca is one of the thoughest blocks you have encountered, as it's strength and Explosive Resistance is greater than Obsidian.

When you place down an Arca, the Arca will see you as its owner. As the owner, you can instantly break your Arca by right-clicking on it while crouching, which is quite handy considering how hard it is. Also, only the owner can add or remove the Totem from it so that no pesky intruders can steal your precious artifact!
The Arca's Totem supersedes over any other Totems on you, so all your Soul Energy will only come from the Arca.
